name: encomiastic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of a piece of writing or speech) praising someone or something: On feast days the faithful would listen to an encomiastic speech praising the venerated saint. Although this book has not been reviewed in our publication, encomiastic reviews of it have appeared internationally. Related word
